author: Jason Zimmerman
text:
The City of Rockville, MD has had the same vendor for its utility billing system since 1983. We are now in the process of creating a utility billing RFP. Does anyone have a utility billing RFP that you can email us to assist in the City's creation of one?
Jason Zimmerman
Revenue Supervisor
Finance Department
111 Maryland Ave
Rockville, MD 20850
Ph#240-314-8421
Fax#240-314-8419
jzimmerman@rockvillemd.gov
Consistent, Timely, Accurate, and Complete.
title: Utility Billing RFP
